description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis- Prepare Yourself For Surgery With Self Hypnosis.' By Pradeep Aggarwal you will learn -

  • The course prepares you mentally for a relaxed and fearless surgery. You can use this course for a major surgery or a minor surgery or even you have dental work done.
  • Learn how hypnosis can help you prepare for a surgery with the powerful techniques of self hypnosis, visualization, imagery and affirmations
  • 1)Self hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down
  • 2)You can alter or change the psychological factors that affect your state of mind with self hypnosis
  • 3)Self hypnosis eases your anxiety that most people have before undergoing a surgery
  • 4)Self hypnosis accelerates the process of healing

This course is ideal for people who want to get their surgery done and lack the courage and confidence to face the surgeon and the surgery , it creates a mental block in their mind which creates fear before facing a surgery.

This course is useful for doctors as well before they do their first surgery to increase their confidence .

This course will also help you overcome depression, stress, negativity and insomnia by using powerful positive affirmations given as bonus in this lecture

This course contains more than 30 minutes of video content designed over 8 lectures including exercises and techniques -

This course contains -

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Guided Visualization Exercise: Prepare Yourself For Surgery

Lecture7:Summary

Lecture 8:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis- Prepare Yourself  For Surgery With Self Hypnosis
